messages.subject: Happy New Year
messages.msgSnippet: Happy New Year from satcho.com Wishing you and yours health and joy for the New Year. Remember to take time for family, friends and good books.
messages.messageBody:
Happy New Year


 

Happy New Year

from

satcho.com


Wishing you and yours health and joy for the New Year.

Remember to take time for family, friends and good books.

messages.messageBody:
All, I have listed 2 rather hard to find books on Ebay. They are Fine
Japanese Sword Fittings, Menuki. Book 1 and 2.

To see the auction, please see the link below.

Cheers

Richard

messages.subject: Re: [nihontostudy] Happy New Year
messages.msgSnippet: Happy holidays Paul reading some of the same also. learning a lot enjoy Mark Cinque Sent via BlackBerry by AT&T ... From: Paul Schwartz
messages.messageBody:
Happy holidays Paul reading some of the same also. learning a lot enjoy Mark Cinque
Sent via BlackBerry by AT&T

-----Original Message-----
From: "Paul Schwartz" <lucashly@...>

Date: Mon, 31 Dec 2007 09:31:31
To:nihontostudy@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [nihontostudy] Happy New Year


I just wanted to say hello. For now I will be heavy on the learning side
as I am very new to the study. I am reading The Samurai Sword by
Yumoto, The Japanese Sword by Santo and The Connoisseur's Book Of
Japanese's Swords by Nagayma. I have joined some other forums. I look
forward to becoming a member of the Northern California Japanese Sword
Club. It would also be great to meet someone in my area. Is there
anything else I should be doing for starters? Thanks for
letting me join your group.
Have a great New Year!
Paul Schwartz

messages.subject: Happy New Year

messages.messageBody:
I just wanted to say hello. For now I will be heavy on the learning side
as I am very new to the study. I am reading The Samurai Sword by
Yumoto, The Japanese Sword by Santo and The Connoisseur's Book Of
Japanese's Swords by Nagayma. I have joined some other forums. I look
forward to becoming a member of the Northern California Japanese Sword
Club. It would also be great to meet someone in my area. Is there
anything else I should be doing for starters? Thanks for
letting me join your group.
Have a great New Year!
Paul Schwartz
